ICustomAlarmToOpcUaMapping.MapPriority (METH)
ICustomAlarmToOpcUaMapping.MapPriority (METH)
Â¶
METHOD MapPriority : UDINT
This function is called to convert he priority of the AlarmConfiguration (0 (highest) .. 255(lowest))
into the OPC UA severity range (1(lowest) .. 1000(highest)).
